records.context_note: Twenty-seven irregular migrants (22 AFG, 5 PAK) apprehended near the border between Greece and Bulgaria, after crossing from Turkey by rubber boat. Migrants reported being victims of threats, beating, dog attacks, robbery, and violent deportation by Bulgarian law enforcement authorities, and showed body marks consistent with physical abuse. They were later pushed back to Greece. Frontex resources were not involved in the apprehension or alleged abuse.
records.evidence_quote: They have declared themselves as vistims of threats, beating, attack of dogs, robbery and violent deportation from Bulgaria to Greece, by the Bukgarian law enforcement authorities. Some of the migrants had body marks, which could indicate physical abuse, including some possible dog bites.
